channel.title: vrops 6.2 upgrade on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in vrops 6.2 upgrade on DefinIT

item.title: #vROps 6.2 – upgrade and utilization dashboards
item.description: As you will see the upgrade is simple and even though its early days I haven’t seen anything that has been broken! If you are interested in seeing an example of the new utilization dashboard scroll to the bottom of this article. Upgrading from 6.1 I will be doing this upgrade on a VA so to begin with I will need the vRealize Operations Manager - Virtual Appliance Operating System upgrade .
